1.SceneDescription: Joey and Rachel's, Rachel is filing her nails as Ross and Ben enter.

lines.Line: Hi, we have a little bathroom emergency

lines.Character: (Ben starts to go, but Ross stops him

lines.Character: (Ben starts to go, but Ross stops him
lines.Line: Ben starts to go, but Ross stops him.

Ben, it's Rachel! (He closes the door.) But whatever
Ben, it's Rachel! (He closes the door.) But whatever

(nervous) So it would just be me alone
Well that—y’know it’s just uh, I’ve never done thatNEWLINEbefore. Me and him alone

I don’t know! Just-just talk to him-entertain him and keep him alive
Okay. (Ben enters) Ben? Come here. All right, I’m gonna leave youNEWLINEhere with Aunt Rachel for about an hour. Okay? Are you gonna be okay
(To Rachel) I wasn’t talking to you
(To Rachel) I wasn’t talking to you
Okay, I’ll see you soon buddy. (He hugs and kisses him.) Be back inNEWLINEan hour
Bye. (Ross exits.) Ahhh… (Silence) So this is fun, huh
Okay. Uh, want something-want something to drink
Uh great! How do you feel about Diet Coke
I’m not allowed to have soda
I’m not allowed to have soda
Okay. Well that’s pretty much all that we have—Oh! Oh! HaveNEWLINEyou ever had a virgin margarita? (Holds up a bottle of margarita mix.

2.SceneDescription: Joey and Rachel's, Rachel and Ben are sitting on the couch bored out of theirNEWLINEminds.

lines.Line: Ben y’know when uh, when you were a baby, you and I used to hangNEWLINEout all the time. ‘Cause I was, I was your daddy’s girlfriend
‘Cause you guys were on a break
‘Cause you guys were on a break
Hey! We were not on a—Okay. That’s fine! Fine.NEWLINEY’know what Ben? One day when you are a lot older I am going to tell you that entireNEWLINEstory over a pitcher of real margaritas, okay
(checks her watch) Fifty-two minutes. (Pause) So no-no brothers andNEWLINEsisters, huh? That must be nice. You don’t have to share stuff
Oh, you’re one of those. But y’know what? I have twoNEWLINEsisters of my own and we just-just tortured each other
Well y’know, we would umm, repeat everything the other said, or uh,NEWLINEwe’d jump out of closets to scare each other, or switch the sugar for the salt soNEWLINEthey’d put salt on their cereal

I’m funny? Oh thank God! Well hey, I’ve got a ton of these!NEWLINEUmm, oh here—Do you want a good one? Here’s a good one. Umm, you uh, you take aNEWLINEquarter, take a quarter and, and you blacken the edge. Right? (Does so.) And then you sayNEWLINEto person, I bet you can’t roll this quarter from your forehead to your chin withoutNEWLINEit leaving your face. And then when they do it, they’re left with a big black pencilNEWLINEline right down the center of their face
Can I do it to you
Can I do it to you
Can I do it to you
Yeah, I-I-I-I’m funny Ben, but I’m not stupid. Okay

3.SceneDescription: Joey and Rachel's, Rachel is reading and there is knock on the door which sheNEWLINEanswers.

lines.Character: (She opens the door to reveal Ross with a pencil mark from his forehead to his chin
lines.Line: She opens the door to reveal Ross with a pencil mark from his forehead to his chin.
I have a bone to pick with you
I have a bone to pick with you

Yes! Ben learned a little trick

That’s right! That’s right! Saran Wrap on the toilet seatNEWLINEso the pee goes everywhere
Yeah that! You know I hate practical jokes! They’re mean andNEWLINEthey’re stupid and-and I don’t want my son learning them
Oh, come on! Saran Wrap on the toilet seat, you don’t thinkNEWLINEthat’s just a little funny?
I was barefoot. Now tell me, the toilet thing is the only thing you taughtNEWLINEhim right
I was barefoot. Now tell me, the toilet thing is the only thing you taughtNEWLINEhim right

4.SceneDescription: Carol and Susan’s, there is a knock on the door and Carol opens it toNEWLINEreveal Rachel.

lines.Line: Hey Rachel! (The camera cuts to her face and we see that Ben pulled theNEWLINEquarter trick with her as well.
What a nice surprise! What are you doing here

Can I ask what—Come on in
Umm uh, I’ll make some coffee and we can uh, chat
I’d love that. I would loooove… (Carol goes to make the coffeeNEWLINEand she sits down.) So uh, so where is sweet little Ben? I would love to have a little..
(jumping up from behind her chair) Gotcha!! (Rachel jumps up startled.
(jumping up from behind her chair) Gotcha!! (Rachel jumps up startled.
I found him! (To Ben) Very funny, come here! (She sits down on theNEWLINEcoffee table and Ben walks up.) That is exactly why I’ve come here to talk to youNEWLINEokay
(from the kitchen) Rach, do you want some sugar in your coffee
(from the kitchen) Rach, do you want some sugar in your coffee
Yes oh—(To Ben)—Do I want sugar in my coffee? (Ben nods no.)NEWLINENo, just some milk would be good Carol. Thanks. (To Ben) Okay, do you remember all thatNEWLINEstuff I taught you yesterday

Seriously, your dad doesn’t like pranks

Seriously, your dad doesn’t like pranks

5.SceneDescription: Monica and Chandler's, scene continued from earlier.

lines.Line: (To Monica) So you came to the room looking for Joey? Did you everNEWLINEin-intend on telling me about this
No, because it-it didn’t seem important
No, because it-it didn’t seem important
Oh, it’s not important? It’s not important?! If itNEWLINEwasn’t for a bridesmaid you’d be marrying him (Points to Joey) not me
Noo!! The point is that is was you that was there that night! ItNEWLINEis you that I am marrying! It is you that I fell in love with
And it is a love that is based on having and giving and receiv—(ShutsNEWLINEup on Monica’s glare.
And it is a love that is based on having and giving and receiv—(ShutsNEWLINEup on Monica’s glare.
I don’t believe it. The most romantic night of my life andNEWLINEI’m runner up
Chandler, please! Do you know how unbelievably glad I am that Joey wasNEWLINEnot there that night?
Hey! (Monica turns and looks at him) Now I’m a man of the cloth, butNEWLINEI still have feelings
(To Joey) Look there is no way you’re doing this wedding now.NEWLINEOkay
(To Joey) Look there is no way you’re doing this wedding now.NEWLINEOkay

What?! That’s not fair! It’s not my fault! I was off with myNEWLINEbridesmaid! And who’s to say I would’ve even said yes?! (To Monica) INEWLINEmean I would’ve said yes. Chandler look y-y-you are making way too big a deal out ofNEWLINEthis, all right? Look, everything worked out okay
Okay, it’s just weird! Okay? I don’t want to be standingNEWLINEtheir saying my vows and then having the mental image of you and Monica! I-I-I need…INEWLINEdon’t know what I need. I need a walk
Wait Chandler come on, let’s—it’s not a big deal
Wait Chandler come on, let’s—it’s not a big deal
Wait Chandler come on, let’s—it’s not a big deal
It is to me. You wanted to sleep with Batman, and instead youNEWLINEhad to settle for Robin. (Walks out and slams the door.

6.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Chandler is sulking on the couch as Joey enters to talk withNEWLINEhim.

lines.Line: Hey. Do you want this scone? (Holds up his plate) It came for me butNEWLINEit would probably rather sleep with you
Chandler, come on nothing even happened

How can I not be upset? Okay? I finally fall in love with thisNEWLINEfantastic woman and it turns out that she wanted you first

Yeah for like a half an hour one night! Chandler, she wants you for theNEWLINErest of her life! You’re so lucky! Look what I missed out on by not being there!NEWLINEAlthough you know what? It could never have worked like you guys did, ‘cause you guysNEWLINEare perfect for each other. Y’know, we look at you and-and we see you together and itNEWLINEjust…it-it fits. Y’know? lines.Line: Yeah, we talked and Monica made me see that I over reacted a littleNEWLINEbit and some things in life are more important

8.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Joey is getting Phoebe some coffee.

lines.Line: (still reading the label) Oh my God! This is a six-hour pill! (ChecksNEWLINEher watch) That’s it! I’m out of the woods! Ohh! What a relief
